nodes.bodyText: how did you come up with this list? is there a script that lists them?

+module come.azure.digitaltwins.core {

nodes.bodyText: Jackson should be available transitively through azure core and netty should not be included in this list. Http clients are pluggable and netty can be replaced by another http client.
I am not sure if we should open anything up specifically for netty.
Why do we need to open this for core?
